steps.title: Ask if They Can Cough
steps.description: Encourage the person to keep coughing if they can breathe or speak.

steps.title: Call for Help
steps.description: If the airway is fully blocked, call emergency services immediately.

steps.title: Give Back Blows
steps.description: Stand behind the person and give up to 5 firm blows between their shoulder blades with the heel of your hand.

steps.title: Perform Abdominal Thrusts (Heimlich)
steps.description: If the object is still stuck, stand behind them, wrap your arms around their waist, and give quick upward abdominal thrusts.

steps.title: Alternate if Needed
steps.description: Alternate 5 back blows and 5 abdominal thrusts until the object is expelled or help arrives.

steps.title: If Person Becomes Unresponsive
steps.description: Start CPR immediately and check the mouth for the object each time before giving rescue breaths.
